mv X y.go
-- x.go --
package p

import "m/q"

type X = q.Q

var _ X
-- y.go --
package p
-- q/q.go --
package q

type Q int
-- stdout --
diff old/x.go new/x.go
--- old/x.go
+++ new/x.go
@@ -2,6 +2,4 @@

 import "m/q"

-type X = q.Q
-
 var _ X
diff old/y.go new/y.go
--- old/y.go
+++ new/y.go
@@ -1 +1,5 @@
 package p
+
+import "m/q"
+
+type X = q.Q
